refnamediv.refpurpose: Assigns a preset from a SoundFont to a channel on a fluidEngine.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: fluidProgramSelect ienginenum, ichannelnum, isfnum, ibanknum, ipresetnum

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in fluidOpcodes. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Assigns a preset from a SoundFont to a channel on a fluidEngine.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ienginenum -- engine number assigned from fluidEngine
ichannelnum -- which channel number to use for the preset in the given fluidEngine
isfnum -- number of the SoundFont from which the preset is assigned
ibanknum -- number of the bank in the SoundFont from which the preset is assigned
ipresetnum -- number of the preset to assign
